problem
Find the maximum subarray sum in an array of integers.
problem

You are given an n x n matrix of integers. Find a path from the top-left to the bottom-right corner such that the product of the numbers along the path has the least number of trailing zeros. You can only move right or down.
problem

You are given a rectangular theatre square with a side of n meters and m meters. You want to pave the square with square tiles of size a x a. What is the least number of tiles needed to pave the square?
problem
Given a string consisting of only 'a' and 'b', find the length of the longest substring that contains at most one 'a'.
problem
For each cell, keep track of the minimum number of trailing zeros you can get to that cell from the top-left. Use dynamic programming, considering both right and down moves.
problem
To cover the n x m square with a x a tiles, divide n by a and m by a, rounding up each time. The answer is ceil(n/a) * ceil(m/a).
problem
Use a sliding window to keep track of the number of 'a's in the current substring. When there are more than one 'a', move the left end of the window forward.
problem
